title: How to Make Berry Poutine

steps.headline: Arrange a good quantity of strawberries or other berries across the base of the ovenproof dish.
Make the cake part.
steps.description: Mix together all the remaining ingredients in a large mixing bowl.

steps.headline: Pour this mixture over the sugared strawberries.
Place in the oven for 30 minutes or until a skewer or toothpick stuck into the cake comes out clean and dry.
Remove from the oven and serve.
steps.description: It goes well with custard, ice cream, or cream. Bon appétit!

text: Preheat the oven to 180ºC/350ºF.  Arrange a good quantity of strawberries or other berries across the base of the ovenproof dish. Sprinkle generously with sugar. Make the cake part. Mix together all the remaining ingredients in a large mixing bowl. Pour this mixture over the sugared strawberries.  Place in the oven for 30 minutes or until a skewer or toothpick stuck into the cake comes out clean and dry.  Remove from the oven and serve. It goes well with custard, ice cream, or cream. Bon appétit!
